PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

A sequel to "NOel?La neige", this title takes place during the heroines' last two weeks in Kamakura, before they enter University after graduating from High School. Communicate with them with visual phone and pave your future.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
